name: Stein World
description:
Stein World is a Fantasy World Role-Playing Game. Play as a lone wolf to explore the fantasy world of Stein. Complete quests and fight against monsters to level up and compete in the rankings of our dungeons.

In Stein World you start as a character who wakes up after a night of heavy drinking, in which you have lost your family stein (beer mug). To get this precious item back you start to explore the world to find clues where your stein could be. In the progress you gear up, complete hundreds of quests and fight in dungeons like the Cygluln Chambers where waves of enemies await you.

Big and persistent fantasy world with a lot of variety filled with hundreds of quests and items, dungeons, professions and much more to come.

Features:
• Embark on hundreds of quest with many different objectives in a diversified fantasy world
• Learn several professions to craft new gear for you or your fellow adventurer
• Defeat the powerful enemies of the dungeons & wave dungeons
• Earn fame & fortune by competing within the ranking system
